name: Oil Change
description: Regular oil changes keep your car's engine running smoothly.

name: Tire Rotation
description: Rotating your tires helps ensure even wear and extends their lifespan.

name: Brake Service
description: Brake service includes inspection, repair, and replacement of brake components.

name: Air Conditioning Service
description: Air conditioning service includes inspection, cleaning, and recharging of the A/C system.

name: Battery Replacement
description: Replace your old battery with a new one to ensure reliable starting in all weather conditions.

name: Alignment Service
description: Alignment service ensures that your car's wheels are properly aligned, reducing tire wear and improving handling.

name: Transmission Service
description: Transmission service includes fluid change, filter replacement, and inspection of the transmission system.

name: Radiator Flush
description: Radiator flush includes draining and refilling the coolant to prevent engine overheating.

name: Fuel System Cleaning
description: Fuel system cleaning includes cleaning the fuel injectors, throttle body, and intake valves.

name: Timing Belt Replacement
description: Timing belt replacement is necessary to prevent engine damage and ensure reliable operation.

name: Suspension Service
description: Suspension service includes inspection and repair of the shocks, struts, and other suspension components.

name: Headlight Restoration
description: Headlight restoration improves visibility and enhances the appearance of your car.
